title: Lethality is the new devourer
body: Completely op for a select few champions and everyone end is screwed

replies.body: I think lithality is over rated .
says the guy who built lethality 5 games in a row :P.

man they gona nerf that thing to the ground i guess , have you seen full lethality GP? 1k hp is gone if you got hit a barrel .
thing is i have cit damage runepage and it seems it doesnot work as it supposed to be so thats why i said that 
crit damage runepage -worthless

> [{quoted}](name=BOOSTED B0N0B0,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=OxWqptnG,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-02-14T11:43:25.074+0000)
>
> I think lithality is over rated .

You've obviously never played as an ADC with lethality. It's epic fun and overpowered. I just got finished with Graves lethality and it's even more powerful than the MF lethality build everyone complains about.
No point in complaining any more. Nerfs are already on pbe.

-5 lethality on Youmuu's isn't anywhere near enough. EoN also needs some nerfs and lethality probably needs to be put back at 40% to start with. Riot buffed what was a balanced stat into the sky and these are the consequences.
It wasnt balanced... Was ignored by most of assassins before the buff. 40% will just make it useless again
Lol I think there is a middle point at 50%!
People were undervaluing lethality at 40%. It wasn't bad, it was being used in competitive play. If Riot hit it down to 40% now people would continue to use it.

i used it too... but it was very bad... just speaking for the top, because just {{item:1031}} . And the meta was {{champion:78}} {{champion:111}} {{champion:57}} with Collossus. 
With old formule {{item:3814}} was too weak.

> [{quoted}](name=Eraenis,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=OxWqptnG,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2017-02-14T14:24:24.475+0000)
>
> No point in complaining any more. Nerfs are already on pbe.

now>in the future.
The point is riot is already taking the actions to pull power from lethality.

> [{quoted}](name=Spaceman5pff,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=OxWqptnG,comment-id=000600010000,timestamp=2017-02-14T20:33:03.389+0000)
>
> The point is riot is already taking the actions to pull power from lethality.
> 

i'm saying that means jack shit to people not playing in PBE. Edit: I derped. LOL.

What it means is that riot is looking to fix it so there is no point crying and flooding the forums.

If they thought it was hotfix worthy, they would have hotfixed it by now.

> [{quoted}](name=Spaceman5pff,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=OxWqptnG,comment-id=00060001000000000001,timestamp=2017-02-14T20:57:49.038+0000)
>
> What it means is that riot is looking to fix it so there is no point crying and flooding the forums.
> 
> If they thought it was hotfix worthy, they would have hotfixed it by now.

True enough, now time to find something else to whine about :P.

Sated devourer is op on a few champions.

Lethality is unniversally useful on basically all ad champions.

it even works on non ad champions and that should say enough

is this bs continues i wont be long until we see full lethality maokai
I've seen lethality ahri. She shrekt our midlaner before the jungler and I came from top lane to shut her down
And when Lethality gets gutted, the ones it was meant for are going to get screwed over while the ones who abused it when it wasn't even meant for them won't care.
We call this the "tank item effect".

"Lethality is the new devourer"

So it is going to be deleted and remade and renamed multiple times before Riot finally deletes it from the game? Didn't see that coming.
Honestly I think this is worse.  Lethality is so messed up, it should merit a hot fix rather than making us wait until a patch.
You can buy it on anybody
Same with devourer, but some are gonna be using the items better than others.
raka with devourer is op
any champ with devourer is, provided they can farm 30 stacks
Except Devourer was fun to use
Is lethality boring to use?

I mean that Devourer was a unique mechanic and it was fun to kill jungle camps and see your wolf get bigger. Lethality is just a scaling armor pen.

{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
Oh okay, that makes more sense. I thought you meant just being stronger, which applies to both devourer and lethality. Well, pretty much every single stat in the game.

lethality isn't the new devourer because having a devourer jungler in the game made 9/10 people not want to play because if the devourer jungler on your team couldnt 1v5 you lost and if they could they just 1v5d until you won and the only person who got to play the game was the devourer jungler themself and only 30 mins into the game
Who wants to play against riven or pantheon right now
Don't forget that everyone was op with sated :P

AND everyone is building it even champs it wasnt made for, like before you had crap like devourer vayne. Well now you have lethality riven irelia and adc;s. Jhin and Mf build it more than most assasians do
but lethality is viable in lcs as devourer is not
If its new devourer then why {{champion:11}} {{champion:203}} {{champion:5}} {{champion:102}} have 0 use of it?

> [{quoted}](name=PiVoRx,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=OxWqptnG,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2017-02-14T20:32:30.129+0000)
>
> If its new devourer then why {{champion:11}} {{champion:203}} {{champion:5}} {{champion:102}} have 0 use of it?

It's not bad on Yi, just slow.

Xin is 100% gonna build it if going for more damage than Bloodrazor and 1 other item (Bork/Triforce)

it's great on most ADs

it's even valuable on juggernauts
It's like devourer except it scales like dogshit.

Lethality is fine, I got it on Ashe and it worked well. Anyone that does primarily or all physical damage will benefit from lethality. You're exaggerating. If it's really a few champs, then tell us what those are so we have something to compare with.
